009package Ch26_MSER;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
013import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
014
015import java.awt.Color;
016import java.awt.Font;
017import java.util.List;
018
019import ij.IJ;
020import ij.ImagePlus;
021import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
022import ij.gui.Overlay;
023import ij.gui.Roi;
024import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
025import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
026import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
027import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
028import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
029import imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.GeometricEllipse;
030import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
031import imagingbook.common.ij.GuiTools;
032import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
033import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
034import imagingbook.common.mser.MserColors;
035import imagingbook.common.mser.MserData;
036import imagingbook.common.mser.MserDetector;
037import imagingbook.common.mser.MserParameters;
038import imagingbook.common.mser.components.Component;
039import imagingbook.common.mser.components.PixelMap.Pixel;
040import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
041import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
042
043/**
044 * <p>
045 * ImageJ plugin which runs MSER detection [1] on the current image and shows
046 * the result as a vector overlay in a new image. If the option
047 * {@code MarkMserPixels} is selected, the output is a color image with pixels
048 * belonging to MSER components marked in different colors. The input image is
049 * always converted to grayscale before MSER detection is performed. See Ch. 26
050 * of [2] for details. If no image is currently open, the user is asked to load
051 * a predefined sample image.
052 * </p>
053 * <p>
054 * [1] J. Matas, O. Chum, M. Urban, and T. Pajdla. Robust widebaseline stereo
055 * from maximally stable extremal regions. Image and Vision Computing 22(10),
056 * 761â€“767 (2004). <br>
057 * [2] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
058 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
059 * </p>
060 * 
061 * @author WB
062 * @version 2022/11/24
063 * 
064 * @see MserDetector
065 */
066public class MSER_Detection_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
067        
068        private static ImageResource SampleImage = GeneralSampleImage.MortarSmall;
069        
070        private static boolean ShowMserCount = true;
071        private static boolean ShowEllipses = true;
072        private static boolean MarkMserPixels = false;
073        private static boolean ShowColorPalette = false;
074        private static boolean ShowMserLabels = false;
075        private static boolean ShowElapsedTime = false;
076        
077        // processing direction
078        private static boolean BlackToWhite = true;             // detect on original image (default)
079        private static boolean WhiteToBlack = false;    // detect on inverted image
080        
081        private static boolean UseTwoColorsOnly = false;        // detect on inverted image
082        private static Color BlackToWhiteColor = MserColors.Yellow.getColor(); //.Orange;
083        private static Color WhiteToBlackColor = MserColors.Cyan.getColor();
084        private static int MinDisplayWidth = 300;
085        
086        private static MserParameters params = new MserParameters();    // MSER parameters
087        
088        private ImagePlus im = null;
089        private Color[] colors = null;
090        private double ellipseStrokeWidth = 0;          // set dynamically
091        private int labelFontSize = 0;                          // set dynamically
092        private Font labelFont = null;                          // set dynamically      
093        private Roi roi = null;
094        private ByteProcessor bp = null;
095        private ImageProcessor ip2 = null;
096        private Overlay oly = null;
097        
098        /**
099         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
100         * is currently open.
101         */
102        public MSER_Detection_Demo() {
103                if (noCurrentImage()) {
104                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(SampleImage);
105                }
106        }
107        
108        @Override
109        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
110                this.im = im;
111                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES;
112        }
113        
114        @Override
115        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
116                roi = im.getRoi();
117                ellipseStrokeWidth = Math.max(0.25, ip.getWidth() * 0.1 / 100);
118                labelFontSize = Math.max(3, (int) Math.round(ip.getWidth() / 100.0));   
119                                
120                if (!runDialog(params)) {
121                        return;
122                }
123                
124                bp = ip.convertToByteProcessor();
125                ip2 = (MarkMserPixels) ? ip.convertToColorProcessor() : ip.convertToByteProcessor();
126                oly = new Overlay();
127                String title = im.getShortTitle() + "-MSER";
128                
129                if (BlackToWhite || WhiteToBlack) title = title + "-";
130                if (BlackToWhite)  title = title + "B";
131                if (WhiteToBlack)  title = title + "W";
132                if (UseTwoColorsOnly) title = title + "-2c";
133                
134                Color[] palette = MserColors.LevelColors;
135                labelFont = new Font(Font.SANS_SERIF, Font.PLAIN, labelFontSize);
136        
137                List<Component<MserData>> msersB = null;
138                List<Component<MserData>> msersW = null;
139//              List<Component<MserData>> msersAll = new ArrayList<>();
140                
141                double elapsedTime = 0;
142                
143                if (BlackToWhite) {
144                        MserDetector detector = new MserDetector(bp, params);
145                        msersB = detector.getMserFeatures();
146                        if (ShowMserCount) {
147                                IJ.log("Found MSERs (BlackToWhite): " + msersB.size());
148                        }
149                        if (UseTwoColorsOnly) 
150                                makeColorsBlackToWhite();
151                        else
152                                makeColors(palette);
153                        drawToOverlay(msersB);
154                        elapsedTime += detector.getElapsedTime();
155                }
156                
157                if (WhiteToBlack) {
158                        bp.invert();
159                        MserDetector detector = new MserDetector(bp, params);
160                        msersW = detector.getMserFeatures();
161                        if (ShowMserCount) {
162                                IJ.log("Found MSERs (WhiteToBlack): " + msersW.size());
163                        }
164                        if (UseTwoColorsOnly) 
165                                makeColorsWhiteToBlack();
166                        else
167                                makeColors(palette);
168                        drawToOverlay(msersW);
169                        elapsedTime += detector.getElapsedTime();
170                }
171                
172                if (ShowMserCount && BlackToWhite && WhiteToBlack) {
173                        IJ.log("Found MSERs total: " + (msersB.size() + msersW.size()));
174                }
175                
176                if (ShowElapsedTime) {
177                        IJ.log(String.format("Algorithm %s: time elapsed %.0fms", params.method, elapsedTime));
178                }
179                
180                if (ShowColorPalette) {
181                        if (UseTwoColorsOnly) 
182                                showTwoColors();
183                        else
184                                showColorPalette(title + "-palette");
185                }
186                
187                // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
188                
189//              Component.sortBySize(msersAll); // optional
190//              drawToOverlay(msersAll);
191                
192                ImagePlus cimp = new ImagePlus(title, ip2);
193                setMserImageProps(cimp, params);
194                cimp.setOverlay(oly);
195                cimp.show();
196                
197                // zoom result image if too small
198                if (cimp.getWidth() < MinDisplayWidth) {
199                        int zoomFac = (int) Math.ceil((double) MinDisplayWidth / cimp.getWidth());
200                        GuiTools.zoomExact(cimp, zoomFac);
201                }       
202        }
203         
204        private void drawToOverlay(List<Component<MserData>> msers) {
205                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
206                ola.setFont(labelFont);
207                
208                for (Component<MserData> c : msers) {
209                        
210                        // ignore MSERs outside the current ROI (if specified)
211                        Pnt2d ctr = c.getProperties().getCenter();
212                        if (roi != null && !roi.containsPoint(ctr.getX(), ctr.getY())) {
213                                continue;
214                        }
215                        
216                        Color vecCol = getColor(c.getLevel());
217                        
218                        // draw contained points
219                        if (MarkMserPixels) {
220                                float[] hsb = Color.RGBtoHSB(vecCol.getRed(), vecCol.getGreen(), vecCol.getBlue(), null);
221                                Color pixCol = Color.getHSBColor(hsb[0], 0.5f, 0.5f);
222                                ip2.setColor(pixCol);
223                                for (Pixel pnt : c.getAllPixels()) {
224                                        ip2.drawDot(pnt.x, pnt.y);
225                                }
226                        }
227                        
228                        if (ShowEllipses) {
229                                // suggests 0.2% of image width as stroke width (but at least 0.5)                      
230                                GeometricEllipse ellipse = c.getProperties().getEllipse();
231                                ola.addShape(ellipse.getShape(), new ColoredStroke(ellipseStrokeWidth, vecCol));
232                                
233                                if (ShowMserLabels) {
234                                        ola.setTextColor(vecCol);
235                                        ola.addText(ellipse.xc, ellipse.yc, Integer.toString(c.ID));
236                                }
237                        }
238                }
239        }
240        
241        // --------------------------------------------
242        
243        private boolean runDialog(MserParameters params) {
244                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
245                addToDialog(params, gd);
246                
247                gd.addCheckbox("BLACK -> WHITE", BlackToWhite);
248                gd.addCheckbox("WHITE -> BLACK", WhiteToBlack);
249                gd.addCheckbox("Use 2 colors only", UseTwoColorsOnly);
250                
251                gd.addMessage("Output parameters:");
252                gd.addCheckbox("Show MSER count", ShowMserCount);
253                gd.addCheckbox("Show elapsed time", ShowElapsedTime);
254                gd.addCheckbox("Show ellipses", ShowEllipses);
255                gd.addNumericField("Ellipse stroke width", ellipseStrokeWidth, 2);
256                gd.addCheckbox("Show MSER labels", ShowMserLabels);
257                gd.addNumericField("Label font size", labelFontSize, 0);
258                gd.addCheckbox("Mark MSER pixels", MarkMserPixels);
259                gd.addCheckbox("Show color palette", ShowColorPalette);
260                
261                gd.showDialog();
262                if (gd.wasCanceled())
263                        return false;
264
265                getFromDialog(params, gd);
266                
267                BlackToWhite = gd.getNextBoolean();
268                WhiteToBlack = gd.getNextBoolean();
269                UseTwoColorsOnly = gd.getNextBoolean(); 
270                // Output:
271                ShowMserCount = gd.getNextBoolean();
272                ShowElapsedTime = gd.getNextBoolean();
273                ShowEllipses = gd.getNextBoolean();
274                ellipseStrokeWidth = gd.getNextNumber();
275                ShowMserLabels = gd.getNextBoolean();
276                labelFontSize = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
277                MarkMserPixels = gd.getNextBoolean();
278                ShowColorPalette = gd.getNextBoolean();
279                                
280//              // Debugging:
281//              params.validateComponentTree = gd.getNextBoolean();
282                                
283                return true;
284        }
285        
286        // --------------------------------------------
287        
288        private void makeColors(Color[] palette) {
289                final int n = palette.length;
290                colors = new Color[256];
291                for (int level = 0; level < 256; level++) {
292                        int k = (int) (n * level / 256.0);              // k in [0,n-1]
293                        colors[level] = palette[k];
294                }
295        }
296        
297        private void makeColorsBlackToWhite() {
298                colors = new Color[256];
299                for (int level = 0; level < 256; level++) {
300                        colors[level] = BlackToWhiteColor;
301                }
302        }
303        
304        private void makeColorsWhiteToBlack() {
305                colors = new Color[256];
306                for (int level = 0; level < 256; level++) {
307                        colors[level] = WhiteToBlackColor;
308                }
309        }
310        
311        private Color getColor(int level) {
312                // level is in 0,..,255
313                if (level < 0) 
314                        level = 0;
315                if (level >= colors.length)
316                        level = colors.length - 1;
317                return colors[level];
318        }
319        
320        private void showColorPalette(String title) {
321                int W = 20;
322                int H = 256;
323                ColorProcessor cp = new ColorProcessor(W, H);
324                for (int level = 0; level < H; level++) {
325                        cp.setColor(getColor(level));
326                        for (int i = 0; i < W; i++) {
327                                cp.drawPixel(i, level);
328                        }
329                }
330                cp.flipVertical();
331                new ImagePlus(title, cp).show();
332        }
333        
334        private void showTwoColors() {
335                {
336                        ColorProcessor cp = new ColorProcessor(20, 64);
337                        cp.setColor(BlackToWhiteColor);
338                        cp.fill();
339                        new ImagePlus("color-BW", cp).show();
340                }
341                {
342                        ColorProcessor cp = new ColorProcessor(20, 64);
343                        cp.setColor(WhiteToBlackColor);
344                        cp.fill();
345                        new ImagePlus("color-WB", cp).show();
346                }
347        }
348
349        
350        // --------------------------------------------
351        
352        private void setMserImageProps(ImagePlus imp, MserParameters params) {
353                imp.setProp("MSER-delta", params.delta);
354                imp.setProp("MSER-maxVariation", params.maxSizeVariation);
355                imp.setProp("MSER-minDiversity", params.minDiversity);
356                imp.setProp("MSER-maxRelArea", params.maxRelCompSize);
357                imp.setProp("MSER-minRelArea", params.minRelCompSize);
358                imp.setProp("MSER-minAbsArea", params.minAbsComponentArea);
359                imp.setProp("MSER-method", params.method.toString());   
360        }
361        
362}
